QuestData.Title: Lines of Communication
QuestData.Description: One of the reasons Ikuti led us to Zangarmarsh was to help open the lines of communication between the draenei and the Kurenai home city of Telaar in Nagrand. In order for messengers to pass swiftly between Telaar and Telredor, the roads must be secured.$B$BOn our way here, we were attacked repeatedly by marshfang slicers. We were able to fight them off, but they would pose a formidable threat to a solitary messenger. Reducing their numbers will help ensure the safety of our messengers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Puluu at the Orebor Harborage wants you to kill 12 Marshfang Slicers.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you made progress in securing the roads?
QuestData.RewardText: That's excellent news. The way is still far from perfectly safe, but the messengers are clever and resourceful.
